class recommendation.UserRestaurantRecommendation[source]

Bases: object

LOGIC_TYPES = ['get_featured_restaurants', 'get_high_ratings_restaurants', 'get_new_created_restaurants', 'get_low_rating_restaurants', 'get_all_restaurants']
get_all_restaurants() → list[source]

Get All restaurants of any cuisine, any cost bracket

Returns:

list of all restaurants

get_featured_restaurants() → list[source]

Get featured restaurants of primary cuisine and primary cost bracket. If none, then all featured restaurants of primary cuisine, secondary cost and secondary cuisine, primary cost

Returns:

list of restaurants

get_high_ratings_restaurants() → list[source]
Get restaurant using following logics in order:

  • All restaurants of Primary cuisine, primary cost bracket with rating >= 4

  • All restaurants of Primary cuisine, secondary cost bracket with rating >= 4.5

  • All restaurants of secondary cuisine, primary cost bracket with rating >= 4.5

Returns:

list of restaurants

get_low_rating_restaurants() → list[source]
Get restaurant using following logics in order:

All restaurants of Primary cuisine, primary cost bracket with rating < 4 All restaurants of Primary cuisine, secondary cost bracket with rating < 4.5 All restaurants of secondary cuisine, primary cost bracket with rating < 4.5

Returns:

list of restaurants

get_new_created_restaurants() → list[source]

Get Top 4 newly created restaurants by rating

Returns:

list of restaurants

static get_ordered_unique_recommendation(recommendations: list) → list[source]

Spread list of lists into single list maintaining order of values

Parameters:

recommendations – List of restaurants

Returns:

list of restaurants

get_restaurant_recommendations(user_instance: User, available_restaurants: dict) → list[source]

Get final recommendation ordered list of restaurants using set of multiple logics

Parameters:

  • available_restaurants – list of available restaurants

  • user_instance – User instance

Returns:

list of restaurants
